duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee a small originations team and lead the sourcing of real estate debt transactions.
Run real estate deals and take the next step up in leadership.
Utilize heavy technical skills in commercial negotiations and deal management.
Cultivate and maintain existing relationships to drive transaction sourcing.
Get hands dirty in the field and demonstrate a willingness to cultivate relationships.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
